languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффективной{/g} дальности составляет <u>(30 + ДБ)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: Ballistic Skill reflects the character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that the character is an excellent shooter to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base hit chance for ranged attacks within effective range is <u>30 + Ballistic Skill</u>.

Ballistic Skill (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base hit chance for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>30 + Ballistic Skill</u>.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}代表角色使用各种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的命中率。弹道技能越高，角色的射击就越是精准，在枪战与遭遇战中就会越是令人望而生畏。在武器的有效射程内时，远程攻击的基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}为<u>（30+弹道技能）</u>%。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}代表角色使用各种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的命中率。弹道技能越高，角色的射击就越是精准，在枪战与遭遇战中就会越是令人望而生畏。{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}在武器的有效射程内时，远程攻击的基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}为<u>30+弹道技能</u>。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP) refleja la precisión de un personaje con toda clase de armas a distancia. Una gran Habilidad de proyectiles indica que el personaje es un tirador certero, alguien temible en un tiroteo o una escaramuza. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impactar{/g} con ataques a distancia en el {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance efectivo{/g} de un arma es del <u>(30 + Habilidad de proyectiles)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP) refleja la precisión de un personaje con toda clase de armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Una gran {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de proyectiles indica que el personaje es un tirador certero, alguien temible en un tiroteo o una escaramuza. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impactar{/g} con ataques a distancia en el alcance efectivo de un arma es de <u>30 + Habilidad de proyectiles</u>.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}（BS）はキャラクターがあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を使用する際の命中率を示す。弾道技能が高いほどそのキャラクターは射撃が得意であり、銃撃戦や小規模な戦闘で活躍する。武器の有効射程内における遠隔攻撃の基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}は、<u>(30 + BS)</u>%に相当する。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}（BS）はキャラクターがあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を使用する際の命中率を示す。弾道{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}が高いほどそのキャラクターは射撃が得意であり、銃撃戦や小規模な戦闘で活躍する。武器の有効射程内における遠隔攻撃の基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}は、<u>30 + 弾道技能</u>に相当する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании дистанционного оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на {g|Encyclopedia:Range}эффективной дальности{/g} составляет <u>(30 + ДБ)</u>%.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на эффективной дальности составляет <u>30 + Дальний Бой</u>%.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на эффективной дальности составляет <u>30 + Дальний Бой</u>%.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} (BF) spiegelt die Genauigkeit eines Charakters mit allen Formen von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Waffen wider. Eine hohe Ballistik-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeit{/g} weist darauf hin, dass der Charakter viel Zielwasser getrunken hat und bei einem Schusswechsel gefährlich ist. Die grundlegende {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für Fernkampfangriffe innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effektiven{/g} Reichweite einer Waffe beträgt <u>(30 + BF)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} (BF) gibt die Genauigkeit eines Charakters mit allen Formen von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} wider. Eine hohe {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} weist darauf hin, dass der Charakter viel Zielwasser getrunken hat und jemand ist, vor dem man sich bei einem Schusswechsel oder in einem Scharmützel vorsehen sollte. Die grundlegende {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} für Fernkampfangriffe innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite einer Waffe ist <u>30 + Ballistik-Fähigkeit</u>.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} (CB) reflète la précision avec laquelle un personnage manie les différentes formes d'armes à distance. Une compétence balistique élevée indique que le personnage est un tireur d'élite, quelqu'un à craindre lors d'une fusillade ou d'une escarmouche. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de base de toucher{/g} lors d'attaques à distance conformément à la {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée efficace{/g} d'une arme sont de <u>(30 + Compétence balistique)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} (CB) reflète la précision avec laquelle un personnage manie les différentes formes d'armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétence{/g} Balistique élevée indique que le personnage est un tireur d'élite, quelqu'un à craindre lors d'une fusillade ou d'une escarmouche. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances de base d'infliger un coup{/g} lors des attaques à distance conformément à la portée effective d'une arme sont de <u>30 + Compétence Balistique</u>.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons as well as trajectory of burst shots with them. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons as well as trajectory of burst shots with them. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.
